dcterms:creator: F. Crocetti
G. Costante
M.L. Fravolini
P. Valigi
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset derived from the Burckhardt model used for training a multi-layer perceptron (MLP) to estimate the best slip as a function of windowed slip-friction measurements.
dcterms:title: Synthetic dataset derived from the Burckhardt model

dcterms:creator: F. Crocetti
G. Costante
M.L. Fravolini
P. Valigi
dcterms:description: A training dataset based on the Burckhardt model used to generate a large number of friction curves for the MLP training.
dcterms:title: Training dataset based on the Burckhardt model
